attributes.action: RIOTS/ANTI-SOCIAL -  NEEDS CLAUSES WRITTEN INTO BENEFITS.
attributes.additional_details:
We the undersigned would like to see CLAUSES WRITTEN into BENEFITS where the people who receive them have a CONTRACT to BEHAVE or LOOSE part if not all for allowing them and there children to cause acts of RIOTS or ANTI-SOCIAL, this would serve a number of issues from the taking part in RIOTS to being ANTI-SOCIAL within there neighbourhood, the ones on BENEFIT do not care about the cost of damage to others as the TAX payer picks the bill up at the end of the day, its good to see that they may loose there house as well.

EMERGENCY SERVICES THE COUNTRY STANDS WITH YOU 100% except the IDIOTS.
